definition: to fall head over heels in love/to be passionately in love
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: She was telling me that they were in love.
sentences.chinese: 她也还说两人正在热恋中呢。

sentences.english: The brain areas associated with intense romantic love, still become active, 25 years later.
sentences.chinese: 在相恋25年后，大脑中与热恋的区域仍然活跃。

sentences.english: I pressed it to my heart with anxious love， that is why the flower faded.
sentences.chinese: 我的热恋的爱把它紧压在我的心上，因此花谢了。

sentences.english: I believe that everyone has already fallen love with someone, maybe someone are head and heels in love now.
sentences.chinese: 相信各位来此的朋友都谈过恋爱，或是正在热恋中。

sentences.english: Recently many Hallyu stars fall in love. Also including you and HJM.
sentences.chinese: 最近很多韩流明星在热恋，也有你的，说是韩智敏。

sentences.english: Suppose for a second, there is a special arrangement for Hailsham students if they are in love.
sentences.chinese: 想一下热恋中的海尔斯罕学生的特别安排的时候。

sentences.english: It is a poem of falling in love, and you and she and he is the poet.
sentences.chinese: 热恋是一首诗，同时热恋也可以把我们变成一个诗人。

sentences.english: It is a poem of falling in love, and you and she and he is the poet.
sentences.chinese: 热恋是一首诗，同时热恋也可以把我们变成一个诗人。

sentences.english: The mirth was something of his own and he had no love burning for her there .
sentences.chinese: 那是他自身的愉快，而没有热恋她的迫切愿望。

sentences.english: Peach and hao nine entered into a relationship.
sentences.chinese: 桃姬和浩九进入了热恋期。

sentences.english: Im in love with a boy, and I think this is terrible.
sentences.chinese: 我与一个男孩热恋，然而我认为这是件很糟的事。

sentences.english: They are passionately in love during this period, and they want to be together all the time.
sentences.chinese: 这是热恋时期，情人不论何时何地总希望能腻在一起。

sentences.english: He's in love with a girl.
sentences.chinese: 他正和一个女孩在热恋中。

sentences.english: Love the dribs and drabs, why not become charm.
sentences.chinese: 热恋时旳点点滴滴，为何变得没有魅力。

definition: stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
the river of love/a stumbling block on the path to enlightenment (Buddhism)
to court/to go steady/to be dating
emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
